subject:
Re: [sugar] [patch][connect-activity] Update to high-level API
	in	latest dbus-python
body:
Le vendredi 04 mai 2007 à 19:24 +0100, Simon McVittie a écrit :> -----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----> Hash: SHA1> > On Fri, 04 May 2007 at 19:16:22 +0100, Simon McVittie wrote:> > The attached patches update the Connect game activity to use the new> > high-level API in the latest git dbus-python, rather than the existing> > low-level and non-public interfaces that Daf was previously using.> > I should have mentioned: this requires the latest git dbus-python (the> patches J5 recently approved, plus a trivial fix I checked in today).> I'll probably make a dbus-python release on Monday if you want to stick> to tarballs (which may be wise).> 
That would be cool as our jhbuild modulsets policy is to use as muchtarballs as possible.

	G.
_______________________________________________Sugar mailing listSugar@laptop.orghttp://mailman.laptop.org/mailman/listinfo/sugar
